sourcesContent: import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-icon', templateUrl: './icon.component.html', styleUrls: ['./icon.component.scss'] }) export class IconComponent implements OnInit { @Input('name') name: any; //This parameter here is the file name from assets/icons; directory: String = '../../../assets/icons/'; ngOnInit() { if(this.name) this.directory = this.directory+this.name+'.svg'; } }
